title: Total Info Watch Face
summary: Digital interactive watch face with accurate information

descriptionHTML:
Total info is a interactive digital watchface with accurate information for wearing your Android wear smartwatch:

► Exclusive design for round and rectangular smartwatches.

► This watch face alerts you when your mobile is far of you, so you never forget your phone anymore.

► Interactive, access more easy to Android Wear settings and change the colors of the watch face directly from your smartwatch.

► Change your watchface look every day, combine the details colors and the background colors.

► Track your steps, set your steps goal from app and take a good life way.

► Also this watchface shows you the more relevant information like the battery of the smartwatch, battery of the phone, complete date and hour on 24h format.

► Support for Android Wear 2

Visit our blog to know more of this or other watchfaces [Spanish soon on English]:

http://samsoft.es/Blog/steps-monster-watchface/

Features:

★ Background and details colors customization
★ Track your daily steps and set your Steps goal
★ Android wear settings shortcut
★ Screen timeout control
★ Disconnection alert when your mobile is far
★ Digital time with full date
★ Watch and phone batteries
★ Exclusive design for rounds and squares (and rectangular) screens
★ Low battery drain
★ Ambient mode design

Compatibility

ALL devices Android Wear, like:

-Huawei watch
-Moto 360 sport
-LG watch R
-Sony SmartWatch
-Asus ZenWatch
-....

NOT with:

-Other OS different of Android Wear

FAQ:

1.-Check that the phone is connected to the smartwatch.
2.-Install the Watch Face.
3.-Wait two minutes until a notification appears with the installation on your smartwatch
4.-If it not appears then you must open Android Wear and run resync apps
5.-If the notification appears, you must press on it or long press on the screen for you take the watch faces list for select it.
6.-Enjoy it!!!

Other watch faces:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=7925815075249357158

For any suggestion or problem contact us on:

http://samsoft.es/Blog/contacto

Or:

https://plus.google.com/+SamsoftEsIT

Or

contacto@samsoft.es

See you soon, regards.
